content: BUENOS AIRES  Nov 14 Argentina likely will authorize telephone service providers to offer satellite television services as part of their packages by the end of the year  a source at the country's Enacom telecoms regulator said on Tuesday.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: UPDATE 1-Argentina to allow telecom companies to provide satellite TV -source

content: BUENOS AIRES  Nov 14 Argentina will likely issue a rule allowing telephone service providers to offer satellite television services as part of their packages by the end of the year  a source at the country's Enacom telecoms regulator said on Tuesday.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: Argentina to allow telecom companies to provide satellite TV -source

content: BUENOS AIRES  Sept 1 Shareholders in Telecom Argentina SA approved a planned merger with cable TV provider Cablevision SA during a meeting on Thursday  the company said in a letter to Argentina's securities regulator on Friday.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: Telecom Argentina shareholders approve merger with Cablevision

content: BUENOS AIRES  July 2 Argentina's Telecom Argentina SA and cable TV provider Cablevisión SA reached a merger agreement enabling them to offer so-called quadruple play services  a result of President Mauricio Macri's telecom sector reforms.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: Telecom Argentina  Cablevision agree to merge amid telecoms reform

content: BUENOS AIRES Telecom Argentina SA and cable TV provider Cablevision SA will have to return broadcast airwaves spectrum to the Argentine government if a proposed merger between the two companies is to be approved  a source with the country's Enacom communications regulator told Reuters on Friday.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: Exclusive: Argentina's Telecom/Cablevision would have to return airwaves

content: MILAN  Feb 3 Telecom Italia on Friday posted a better-than-expected 14.4 percent rise in full-year core earnings  helped by cost cuts and strong results from its domestic operations.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-Telecom Italia 2016 core earnings beat forecasts with 14 pct rise

content: BUENOS AIRES  Sept 23 Even though new rules have not yet been implemented  telecom companies in Argentina are preparing for a more competitive market as the government expects reforms to attract $20 billion in investments over four years.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: Argentina says telecom reforms to draw $20 bln; companies prepare

content: * Said on Tuesday it had appointed Ignacio Cruz Moran as new chief financial officer (CFO)

content: MILAN  March 4 Shares in Telecom Italia  rose 1.9 percent on Friday after the Argentine regulator was said to have approved the Italian phone group's sale of a stake in Telecom Argentina and  speculation abounded its CEO may be at risk.

title: Telecom Italia shares up as Argentina sale said to have been cleared

content: The following factors could affect Italian markets on Friday.

content: BUENOS AIRES  March 3 Argentina's new telecoms regulator on Thursday approved Telecom Italia's sale of its controlling stake in Telecom Argentina to investment firm Fintech  a source at the regulator said.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: UPDATE 1-Argentine regulator okays sale of controlling stake in Telecom Italia unit

content: BUENOS AIRES  March 3 Argentina's ENACOM telecoms regulator on Thursday approved Telecom Italia's  sale of its controlling stake in Telecom Argentina  to investment firm Fintech  a source at the regulator said.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: Argentina okays Fintech purchase of controlling stake in Telecom Italia unit

content: MILAN  March 8 Telecom Italia said on Tuesday it had completed the much-anticipated sale of its stake in Telecom Argentina TEC2.BA to investment group Fintech  with the total amount generated by the disposal confirmed at over $960 million.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: RPT-Telecom Italia concludes sale of Argentine unit to Fintech

content: MILAN  March 8 Telecom Italia said on Tuesday it had completed the much-anticipated sale of its stake in Telecom Argentina to investment group Fintech  with the total amount generated by the disposal confirmed at over $960 million.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: Telecom Italia concludes sale of Argentine unit to Fintech

content: BUENOS AIRES  Feb 23 Investment firm Fintech launched a bid on Tuesday for Class B shares of Telecom Italia's Argentine unit listed on the Buenos Aires Merval stock exchange  the company said in a statement.
name: Telecom Argentina Stet - France Telecom SA
title: Fintech launches bid for Telecom Argentina Class B shares

content: BUENOS AIRES  Oct 15 Argentina's telecoms regulator on Thursday nixed the sale of a 68 percent stake in Telecom Argentina holding company Sofora to investment firm Fintech  the regulator AFTIC said in a statement.

title: UPDATE 1-Argentina regulator nixes telecoms sale to Fintech

content: BUENOS AIRES  Oct 15 Argentina's telecoms regulator on Thursday nixed the sale of a 68 percent stake in Telecom Argentina holding company Sofora to investment firm Fintech  the regulator AFTIC said in a statement.
